verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of David, when Doeg the Edomite came and told) (Saul, and said to him, "David has come to the house of <S%H288>Ahimelech.<s%>") <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H1984>boast<s%> in <S%H9567>evil,<s%> O <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%>? The <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> [endures] <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

But <S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H5422>break<s%> you <S%H5422>down<s%> <S%H5331>forever;<s%> He will <S%H2846>snatch<s%> you up, and <S%H5255>tear<s%> you <S%H5255>away<s%> from [your] <S%H168>tent,<s%> And <S%H8327>uproot<s%> you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
And the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> And will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at him, [saying,]

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> who would not <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> his <S%H4581>refuge,<s%> But <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> [And] was <S%H5810>strong<s%> in his [evil] <S%H1942>desire.<s%>"

But as for me, I am like a <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>give<s%> Thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> [it], And I will <S%H6960>wait<s%> on Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> for [it is] <S%H2896>good,<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones.<s%>
